note:
The closer the wet-bulb temperature gets to human body temperature (37°C, the less you can sweat, so the closer you are to being killed by heat.

This account posts forecasts for the most dangerous upcoming heatwaves worldwide, that is, those with the highest wet-bulb temperatures

This bot was built by and is run by @eob. Feedback welcome.

See also a companion bot @heatwave_usa for heat waves just in the United States

Weather data from https://openweathermap.org

note:
🌏 Born at 312 PPM

Retired NGO executive doing my best to stay informed and raise awareness about environmental crises, climate breakdown, and the rapacious, murderous impact of greedy capitalists and the politicians they own.

Why the name? Back in the day, empires placated their citizens with "bread and circuses." Now we get fast food and apps. But it's all basically the same — distraction from what's REALLY happening.

Nature cartoonist, bird artist, author of many science books for all ages. About: http://rosemarymosco.com. She/her

🍉 🍉 Hello, I’m a journalist and the author of books including ‘The Anti-Capitalist Book Of Fashion’ and ‘Foot Work – What Your Shoes Tell You About Globalisation.’

On my website you’ll find secure ways to contact me, plus my fortnightly newsletter which includes the 'Patched' fashion advice column.

I like social justice, photography, Queerality, SFF books, fun bots and Star Trek - esp Discovery. Plus veganism, #SecondhandFirst finds, textile craft & visible mending.
